Name: Le Sang Et Sable
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Reminiscent of a brandy-based Blood & Sand .
History: Adapted from a recipe by Toby Cecchini in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Sang Et Sable contains 189 calories
